import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' const PostItem = ({post,auth}) => { const { _id,text,name,avatar,user,likes,comments,date } = post return (

{name}

{text}

{/* {date} */}

Discussion {comments.length}
) } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ auth:state.auth }) export default connect(mapStateToProps,{})(PostItem)
